name: WireTap Studio Packaged Track
summary: Learn about .WTPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WTPT files are saved in a package format, similar to a Mac OS X application. The audio files are saved in the Contents/​Resources/​Audio directory. Editing information is saved in the Info.plist file.
NOTE: To export a WTPT file from WireTap Studio, right-click an audio file inside the playlist and select "Package Recording and Edits..."

description: Audio package saved by WireTap Studio, a system and application audio recording utility; includes one or more audio files as well as information about edits made by the user.
